guideline.descriptionGD: User manual for the Li-SAFE portal

guideline.nameGD: Info Template training manual battery_ Li-ion 20140801.pdf
guideline.descriptionGD: Information on the topics in the rescue and training manual, and the specific colouring. This document is a template made by CTIF Commission for Extrication and New Technology in cooperation with RECHARGE. Designer is Kurt Vollmacher (project leader).

guideline.nameGD: Filled in template training manual battery_Li_ion_20140801.pdf
guideline.descriptionGD: Example of the template 'Rescue and training manual battery for vehicle', made by CTIF Commission for Extrication and New Technology

guideline.nameGD: Guidlines Template rescue and training manual vehicle Car 16 08 2014.pdf
guideline.descriptionGD: Example of a 'Information for first and second responders rescue and training manual vehicle' sheet, made by CTIF Commission for Extrication and New Technology, Designer Kurt Vollmacher project leader.

guideline.nameGD: Symbols to be used in the rescue and training manual and rescue sheet 20140625.pdf
guideline.descriptionGD: Overview of the symbols used in the rescue and training manual for battery and for the vehicle.
This document contains the meshes made in the Battery Safety project to identify the most important test and safety standards for Lithium-ion batteries
Document with guidelines for to store Lithium-ion batteries safely and guidelines on how to handle Lithium-ion batteries on fire

guideline.nameGD: Information for rescue and emergency services lithium ion batteries in a storage facility.pdf
guideline.descriptionGD: Example of a information sheet for rescue and emergency services concerning Lithium-ion batteries in storage facilities. This document is a template made by CTIF Commission for Extrication and New Technology in cooperation with RECHARGE. Designer is Kurt VOllmacher (project leader).
